passwordResetPage.emailSentMessage: We have sent you an email to {email}. Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password. You will receive instructions via email to create a new password.
passwordResetPage.forgotPasswordPrompt: Please enter the email address associated with your account to reset your current password.
passwordResetPage.forgotPasswordPromptBold: You will receive instructions via email to create a new password.
